name: Drive Out The Aggressors
description:
Defeat the enemies and protect your land. Unlock new heros and plan your army wisely to drive all the aggressors away.

This game was made for Historically Accurate Jam 4.

How to play:

- Plan your army in the army tab

- Unlock new heros and earn more crystals by defeating levels

- Upgrade your heros

- Defeat the final level 

Authors:

- Phan Son Loc ( https://phansonloc1999.itch.io/ )

- Rumis ( https://rumis.itch.io/ )

- Katori (https://katori-re.itch.io/)
